body_html:
@resec What is the signature of your proposed API? I.e. what exactly do you mean by 'input stream'?

Note that Read{Binary,Text}Proto are pretty short helper functions, and only exist because there are multiple uses in tests and command-line tools, when reading from files. The proto library already has APIs to perform streaming input, which could be used directly without any TensorFlow-side wrapper.

body:
@resec What is the signature of your proposed API?  I.e. what exactly do you mean by 'input stream'?

Note that Read{Binary,Text}Proto are pretty short helper functions, and only exist because there are multiple uses in tests and command-line tools, when reading from files.  The proto library already has APIs to perform streaming input, which could be used directly without any TensorFlow-side wrapper.
